programme.title: Frisco Bowl
programme.desc: Memphis (10-2) vs. West Virginia (6-6) in the seventh Frisco Bowl. From Toyota Stadium in Frisco, Texas. Senior RB Mario Anderson Jr. (19 TDs) and Memphis bid for their fourth bowl win in five years under coach Ryan Silverfield, while also looking to add to the AACs 4-1 all-time bowl record vs. Big 12 teams. The Mountaineers will be transitioning back to former coach Rich Rodriguez for 2025.

programme.title: Boca Raton Bowl
programme.desc: Western Kentucky (8-5) vs. James Madison (8-4) in the 11th Boca Raton Bowl. From FAU Stadium in Boca Raton, Fla. QB Alonza Barnett III and the JMU Dukes bid for their first bowl victory, working from the foundation set the last two years by now-Indiana coach Curt Cignetti. C-USA runner-up WKU has built a 7-3 bowl record, including wins over Sun Belt teams the last three years.

programme.title: LA Bowl
programme.desc: California (6-6) vs. UNLV (10-3) in the fourth LA Bowl. From SoFi Stadium in Los Angeles. ACC first-teamers Teddye Buchanan (LB) and Nohl Williams (CB) head the defense for Cal, which looks to follow Fresno State and UCLA as home-state winners of this game. The Mountain West runner-up Rebels are in just their third bowl game since 2000, when they last won a postseason game, in the Las Vegas Bowl.

programme.title: College Football Playoff First Round
programme.desc: Indiana (11-1) at Notre Dame (11-1) in a College Football Playoff first-round game. From Notre Dame Stadium. A Hoosier State showdown kicks off the first-ever 12-team CFP format, with first-year coach Curt Cignetti leading IU into South Bend for the first time since 1991, a season that ended with the Hoosiers most recent bowl win. QB Riley Leonard and RB Jeremiyah Love spearhead the Irish against a defense led by all-Big Ten lineman Mikail Kamara, LB Aiden Fisher and DB DAngelo Ponds.

programme.title: Dexter: Original Sin
programme.desc: Young Dexter Morgan struggles to keep his urges in check while navigating life with his father, Harry, and sister, high-school senior Deb. After Harry has a health scare, Dexter realizes it may finally be time to fulfill his destiny. Series premiere.

programme.title: The Dead Dont Hurt (2023)
programme.desc: In the 1860s western frontier, the fiercely independent Vivienne Le Coudy joins her lover Holger Olsen in Elk Flats, Nevada. But the Civil War tears them apart, leaving Vivienne to fight corrupt Mayor Schiller and his ruthless partner. When Holger returns, they must confront their changed selves amidst a landscape of love, betrayal, and the struggle for justice.

programme.title: The Agency
programme.desc: Henry and Martian wade into a diplomatic incident with the Belarusian delegation. Dropped into her mission by Naomi, Danny walks a tightrope. Poppy and Martian attempt a fresh start. Osman threatens Sami.

programme.title: Get Rich Or Die Tryin (2005)
programme.desc: Drama about a street kid turned drug dealer turned rap artist, loosely based on the life of hip-hop star Calvin "50 Cent" Jackson.

programme.title: Faster (2010)
programme.desc: Driver seeks revenge on the man responsible for his brothers death, but a devoted cop gets wind of his plan and tries to stop him from carrying it out. Meanwhile, a hit man attempts to end Drivers life before he completes his task.

programme.title: The Firm (1993)
programme.desc: A young lawyer discovers the firm hes hired into is controlled by the mob and attempts to escape from their clutches.

programme.title: Cocktail (1988)
programme.desc: In this tasty romantic drama, a cocky skirt-chasing bartender drops out of law school in search of a top-shelf lifestyle. Later, his romance with a pretty waitress is threatened by an alluring fashion executive who wants him all to herself.

programme.title: Days of Thunder (1990)
programme.desc: Tom Cruise guns the engine in this action drama about a stock-car racer.

programme.title: The Girl in the Pool (2024)
programme.desc: Thomas has the ideal life with a good job, a house, and a loving family. All this is threatened when his mistress is found dead in his swimming pool on the same day his family throws a surprise birthday party in the same backyard. As he scrambles to maintain his life as it has been, Thomas soon discovers that he might not be the only one hiding something.

programme.title: The Good Liar (2019)
programme.desc: Roy Courtnay has made a successful living as a con artist. He crosses paths with wealthy widow Betty McLeish, who seems like the perfect opportunity for an easy job. However, the deeper Roy falls into Bettys life, the deeper his emotions run for her. What he thought would be a straightforward swindle unfolds into a significantly more complicated moment in his life.

programme.title: Pig (2021)
programme.desc: A truffle hunter who lives alone in the Oregon wilderness must visit Portland to find the mysterious person who stole his beloved foraging pig.

programme.title: Contagion (2011)
programme.desc: In this ensemble thriller about a virus that quickly becomes a global pandemic, a husband copes with the sudden death of his wife, while a doctor puts herself at risk to find a cure and an activist blogger stokes societys paranoia.

programme.title: Flight (2012)
programme.desc: A veteran pilot successfully lands a commercial airliner following a disastrous malfunction and is hailed by the public as a hero, but a subsequent investigation threatens to expose his history of substance abuse.

programme.title: 3:10 to Yuma (2007)
programme.desc: Remake of the 1957 Western about a rancher escorting an outlaw to a rendezvous with the law, while the latters henchmen try to head them off and free their leader.

programme.title: The Hateful Eight (2015)
programme.desc: A bounty hunter and his captured fugitive seek refuge from a blizzard in a mountain cabin along with six other distrustful travellers.

programme.title: Dexter: Original Sin
programme.desc: Young Dexter Morgan struggles to keep his urges in check while navigating life with his father, Harry, and sister, high-school senior Deb. After Harry has a health scare, Dexter realizes it may finally be time to fulfill his destiny. Series premiere.

programme.title: Bodies Bodies Bodies (2022)
programme.desc: As an intense tropical storm bears down on a remote family estate, a cohort of privileged, out-of-touch twenty-somethings plans to spare no expense for an explosive party. Yet, their evening of drunken merriment soon takes a sinister turn when an innocent game yields fatal consequences, all the while exposing the fake personalities that lie beneath the friends carefully curated exteriors.

programme.title: Scary Movie 2 (2001)
programme.desc: A demented professor leads a group of students to haunted-house scares by tricking them into thinking they are participating for a school project.

programme.title: Scary Movie 3 (2003)
programme.desc: This sequel spoofs "Signs", "The Ring", "The Matrix Reloaded", "The Others", "The Sixth Sense" and "8 Mile".

programme.title: The Fabulous Four (2024)
programme.desc: Three lifelong female friends, a tight-knit group who have preserved their friendship for decades since their college years, embark on a trip to Florida with a specific reason to become bridesmaids. Never mind that they are all over sixty years of age. They are attending their college friends surprise wedding. However, as they spend time rekindling friendship moments and memories, other issues also emerge.

programme.title: Flashdance (1983)
programme.desc: A Pittsburgh steel-mill welder by day and an exotic dancer by night dreams of a ballet career.

programme.title: Dear Santa (2024)
programme.desc: Liam writes to Santa asking him to prove that hes real. But Liam is dyslexic and accidentally sends his letter to Satan instead, who shows up at Liams house, excited to have his first fanboy letter and wanting a little of Liams soul.

programme.title: Old School (2003)
programme.desc: In an effort to recapture their youth, three disillusioned men start a frat house, then run afoul of the dean. Luke Wilson and Will Ferrell star in this uneven "Animal House" rip-off from director Todd Phillips, who co-wrote the script.

programme.title: The Painter (2024)
programme.desc: Peter, an ex-CIA operative, reluctantly finds himself face-to-face with the past he tried to run from when he unexpectedly encounters an enigmatic young woman from his past. As he and the woman suddenly find themselves the target of both a ruthless assassin and a paramilitary black ops force, he easily taps back into the training that he thought he had forgotten for good.

programme.title: Shaft (2000)
programme.desc: Dynamic Samuel L. Jackson stars as New York City cop John Shaft, who quits the force and decides to dispense his own brand of vigilante justice against a racist killer (Christian Bale) and a Dominican drug lord (Jeffrey Wright). Richard Roundtree, who played the original John Shaft in three 70s crime dramas, has a cameo as Jacksons uncle and namesake. Busta Rhymes, Vanessa Williams, Dan Hedaya.

programme.title: Confess, Fletch (2022)
programme.desc: Confess, Fletch is a reboot of the classic crime-comedy film. This time, Fletch becomes the main suspect in a series of murders while investigating thieves that stole his girlfriends art collection. To exonerate himself, Fletch begins his own investigation into the murders and discovers a lot of people could be the guilty party, including his art collecting girlfriend.

programme.title: The Agency
programme.desc: Henry and Martian wade into a diplomatic incident with the Belarusian delegation. Dropped into her mission by Naomi, Danny walks a tightrope. Poppy and Martian attempt a fresh start. Osman threatens Sami.

programme.desc: When Shiori Ito took the risk of naming her high-profile rapist, she didnt expect to become the face of the #MeToo movement in Japan. This documentary explores that, as well as the deep consequences of going public with her accusations. The conversation is intimate since the director is also the victim, and the context is often video diaries as she tries to bring her abuser to justice.

programme.title: The Hurt Locker (2008)
programme.desc: Jeremy Renner heads the cast of this Oscar-winning war drama about a trio of soldiers who specialise in dismantling improvised explosive devices in Baghdad. These three members of the Explosive Ordnance Disposal squad must put their fear and their personal beefs aside to keep themselves from going to "the hurt locker", the nickname soldiers have for where you recuperate after being injured in an explosion.

programme.desc: A robbery at a sperm bank has Benson and Stabler racing to recover fertilised embryos before it is too late. The investigation into a long list of suspects eventually leads to a pair of publicity-seeking extremists, and to Bensons personal fear of missing out on motherhood.

programme.title: Law and Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson poses as a prison inmate to expose a corrupt guard suspected of stealing evidence in a rape case.

programme.title: Law and Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Robin Williams guest stars as engineer Merritt Rook, who poses as a police officer on the phone to trick people into committing criminal acts. Rooks clever self-defence at trial sets him free, leading to publicity and followers stemming from his anti-authority message.

programme.title: Law and Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A pregnant woman is found raped and dead in a house fire, and attempts to interview her fiancé, a member of a wealthy coffee-trading family, are hampered by his lawyer. programme.title: Law and Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When Stabler gets a call to help catch a trespasser, hes shocked when the clues lead him to a suspect in his own family: his daughter Kathleen. Things get so bad that he seeks help from his estranged mother as he tries to save his daughter.

programme.title: Law and Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A famous astronaut is found dead in Battery Park. The investigation hits a dead end, so Stabler seeks help from an old mentor, Dick Finley, a NASA astronaut and former colleague of the victim.

programme.title: Law and Order: Special Victims Unit

programme.desc: While searching for the woman responsible for handcuffing two traumatised adolescents in the back of a van, the detectives turn up evidence that leads them to suspect that many foster children are being put in danger. programme.desc: Benson hears from her half-brother, who is on the run because of sexual-assault charges. He continues to claim his innocence but evidence keeps piling up against him, and Benson reluctantly agrees to help in the federal investigation.

programme.desc: Benson and Stabler question the CEO of an online dating service after discovering a members body stuffed inside a suitcase.

programme.title: Superman II

programme.title: Superman III
programme.desc: Ersatz kryptonite laced with tobacco tar splits Superman (Christopher Reeve) in two: good Clark Kent and bad Man of Steel.

programme.title: Venus and Serena

programme.title: A Shot in the Dark
programme.desc: Clumsy Inspector Clouseau (Peter Sellers) visits a nudist camp to prove a French maid (Elke Sommer) innocent of murder.

programme.title: Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire

programme.title: The LEGO Batman Movie

programme.title: Rio

programme.title: Megamind
programme.desc: An evil genius (Will Ferrell) must create a powerful new opponent after defeating his heroic nemesis leaves him without purpose.

programme.title: Yes Man

programme.title: Leatherheads
programme.desc: A 1920s football star (George Clooney) tries to give his sagging sport a boost, while he and a new teammate (John Krasinski) vie for the affections of a feisty newswoman (Renée Zellweger).

programme.title: Cats & Dogs: The Revenge of Kitty Galore

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winter's War
programme.desc: A huntsman (Chris Hemsworth) and a fellow warrior (Jessica Chastain) battle an ice queen (Emily Blunt) and her evil, resurrected sister (Charlize Theron).

programme.title: Traffik
programme.desc: A couple and their two friends embark on a weekend getaway to an isolated estate in the mountains. They soon find themselves in a fight for their lives when members of a violent biker gang show up to protect their secrets from the outside world.

programme.title: Trap
programme.desc: A man and his teenage daughter realize they're at the center of a dark and sinister event while watching a concert.

programme.title: Knox Goes Away
programme.desc: Diagnosed with a rapidly evolving form of dementia, a contract killer gets the chance to redeem himself by saving the life of his estranged son.

programme.title: Out of the Furnace
programme.desc: A steelworker (Christian Bale) takes matters into his own hands when his brother (Casey Affleck) joins one of the Northeast's most-ruthless crime syndicates, then disappears.

programme.title: Keanu
programme.desc: A man (Keegan-Michael Key) and his cousin (Jordan Peele) pose as ruthless gangsters to recover a stolen kitten.

programme.title: Tuesday
programme.desc: A mother and her daughter must confront Death when it arrives in the form of an astonishing talking bird.

programme.title: The Iron Claw
programme.desc: The true story of the Von Erich brothers, who, through tragedy and triumph, under the shadow of their domineering father and coach, seek epic immortality on the biggest stage in sports.

programme.title: Addicted
programme.desc: A successful businesswoman (Sharon Leal) puts her family, career and life on the line to satisfy her addiction to sex.

programme.title: Climax
programme.desc: When members of a dance troupe are lured to an empty school, drug-laced sangria causes their jubilant rehearsal to descend into a dark and explosive nightmare as they try to survive the night -- and find out who's responsible -- before it's too late.

programme.title: The Legend of Tarzan
programme.desc: Muchos años después de haber dejado África, Tarzán regresa al Congo para servir como un emisario comercial, sin saber que en realidad es un peón del malévolo plan que ha trazado un capitán belga.

programme.title: Wonder Woman
programme.desc: Diana, hija de dioses y princesa de las amazonas, nunca ha salido de su isla. Hasta que un piloto accidentado que llega a la isla le explica que se está desarrollando una gran guerra que puede destruir el mundo y Diana parte a la batalla.

programme.title: Hercules
programme.desc: El héroe (Lou Ferrigno) musculoso crea una fuerza especial y se enfrenta a varios robots espaciales para salvar a una princesa secuestrada.

programme.title: Nature of the Crime
programme.desc: Después de décadas en prisión, tres hombres navegan por la compleja burocracia del sistema de libertad condicional y lidian con su costo psicológico.

programme.title: X-Men Origins: Wolverine
programme.desc: Buscando consuelo de su oscuro pasado Logan, más conocido como Wolverine, parece haber encontrado el amor y la alegría con Kayla Silverfox pero todo cambia cuando ella es asesinada.

programme.title: X-Men: Apocalypse
programme.desc: Apocalipsis, el mutante más poderoso, despierta tras miles de años de letargo y pretende destruir a toda la humanidad. Sólo un grupo de jóvenes mutantes, dirigidos por el Profesor X y Mística, podrán impedirlo.

programme.title: Dune: Prophecy
programme.desc: Mientras Tula intenta evitar que su plan secreto sea descubierto por las otras hermanas, Desmond se pone en pie de guerra para acabar con los insurgentes.

programme.title: Joker
programme.desc: Arthur Fleck adora hacer reír a la gente, pero su carrera como comediante es un fracaso. El repudio social, la marginación y una serie de trágicos acontecimientos lo conducen por el sendero de la locura y, finalmente, cae en el mundo del crimen.

programme.title: Furiosa: A Mad Max Saga
programme.desc: La joven Furiosa es arrebatada del Paraje Verde de las Muchas Madres por una horda de motociclistas. El señor de la guerra que dirige su grupo se enfrenta a otro tirano y, mientras tanto, Furiosa aprovecha la batalla para intentar volver a casa.

programme.title: Clash of the Titans
programme.desc: Perseo, el hijo de Zeus, se embarca en una peligrosa misión para prevenir que Hades derroque al rey de todos los dioses y arrase con la Tierra.

programme.title: Get Millie Black
programme.desc: Millie-Jean Black, una antigua detective de Scotland Yard, regresa a Kingston para trabajar en casos de personas desaparecidas.

programme.title: Blue Beetle
programme.desc: El Escarabajo, una antigua reliquia extraterrestre, elige al estudiante Jaime Reyes como el huésped simbiótico en cuyo cuerpo resguardarse. A partir de ese momento, Jaime desarrolla una armadura que le otorga poderes increíbles e impredecibles.

programme.title: Joker: Folie à Deux
programme.desc: El comediante fracasado Arthur Fleck conoce al amor de su vida, Harley Quinn, mientras está en el Hospital Estatal de Arkham. Al ser liberados, la pareja se embarca en una aventura romántica.

programme.title: DC League of Super-Pets
programme.desc: El superperro Krypto se une a un grupo de divertidos y descerebrados animales para que lo ayuden a rescatar a los superhéroes de la Liga de la Justicia, que han sido secuestrados.

programme.title: The French Connection
programme.desc: New York Detective Popeye Doyle (Gene Hackman) and his partner (Roy Scheider) chase a French heroin smuggler.

programme.title: Parenthood
programme.desc: A middle-class man (Steve Martin), his wife (Mary Steenburgen), his father and a divorcee (Dianne Wiest) try to be good parents.

programme.title: Take This Waltz
programme.desc: A young woman (Michelle Williams) is torn between the husband (Seth Rogen) that she loves and a new man (Luke Kirby) in her life, whom she's unable to ignore.

programme.title: Brooklyn
programme.desc: An Irish immigrant (Saoirse Ronan) in 1950s New York falls for a tough Italian plumber (Emory Cohen), but faces temptation from another man (Domhnall Gleeson) when she returns to her homeland for a visit.

programme.title: Gattaca
programme.desc: An outcast (Ethan Hawke) takes part in a complicated and perilous scheme to assume the identity of a genetically engineered citizen (Jude Law).

programme.title: RoboCop
programme.desc: In 2028, a robotics company sees a chance to bring its technology to American law enforcement by transforming a critically injured police officer (Joel Kinnaman) into a cyborg.

programme.title: San Andreas
programme.desc: When the San Andreas fault triggers a magnitude 9 earthquake, a search-and-rescue helicopter pilot (Dwayne Johnson) must navigate the destruction from Los Angeles to San Francisco to bring his estranged wife (Carla Gugino) and daughter to safety.

programme.title: The Mummy: Tomb of the Dragon Emperor
programme.desc: After his son is tricked into awakening a cursed Chinese emperor, Rick O'Connell (Brendan Fraser) and his family seek a way to send the megalomaniac and his 10,000 warriors back to their graves.

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
programme.desc: After meeting the gal (Mary Elizabeth Winstead) of his dreams, a charming slacker (Michael Cera) must contend with an army of her ex-boyfriends, wanting to get rid of him.

programme.title: Bachelorette
programme.desc: After ruining their friend's wedding gown, bridesmaids (Kirsten Dunst, Isla Fisher, Lizzy Caplan) set out on a frantic search for a replacement, but their mission degenerates into a night of booze, drugs and nightclubbing.

programme.title: Dear White People
programme.desc: A campus culture war between blacks and whites at a predominantly white school comes to a head when the staff of a humor magazine stages an offensive Halloween party.

programme.title: The Time Traveler's Wife
programme.desc: The unusual genetic makeup of a librarian (Eric Bana) causes him to travel back and forth through time, so that he and his beloved (Rachel McAdams) are always out of sync.

programme.title: Great Expectations
programme.desc: In a modern adaptation of Dickens' classic, an artist (Ethan Hawke) deals with rejection from his childhood sweetheart (Gwyneth Paltrow).

programme.title: The Perfect Host
programme.desc: A crook on the run cons his way into a dinner party whose host is anything but ordinary.

programme.title: The Perfect Host
programme.desc: A crook on the run cons his way into a dinner party whose host is anything but ordinary.

programme.title: Shut In
programme.desc: Living in isolation in rural Maine, a widowed child psychologist (Naomi Watts) starts to believe that the ghost of a missing boy (Jacob Tremblay) is in her house during a dangerous ice storm.

programme.title: Juliet, Naked
programme.desc: Annie breaks up with her longtime boyfriend Duncan -- a teacher who's obsessed with former 1990s rocker Tucker Crowe. She soon develops an unexpected bond with Tucker when he visits his pregnant daughter in London.

programme.title: Get Shorty
programme.desc: A film-loving loan shark (John Travolta) teams with a B-movie producer (Gene Hackman) to become a Hollywood mogul.

programme.title: Military Wives
programme.desc: Faced with their loved ones serving in Afghanistan, women from different backgrounds come together to form the very first military wives choir, helping each other through some of life's most difficult moments on an international stage.

programme.title: Red Dawn
programme.desc: After foreign troops seize control of an American town, a group of young people takes refuge in the surrounding woods and launches guerrilla attacks against the enemy.

programme.title: Blackthorn
programme.desc: Leaving Bolivia and heading back to the U.S., the outlaw formerly known as Butch Cassidy (Sam Shepard) has a final adventure.

programme.title: Eye in the Sky
programme.desc: A lieutenant general (Alan Rickman) and a colonel (Helen Mirren) face political opposition after ordering a drone missile strike to take out a group of suicide bombers in Nairobi, Kenya.

programme.title: Deadpool
programme.desc: Armed with accelerated healing powers and a twisted sense of humor, mercenary Wade Wilson (Ryan Reynolds) adopts the alter ego Deadpool and hunts down the man (Ed Skrein) who nearly destroyed his life.

programme.title: Wanted
programme.desc: After his estranged father is murdered, an office drone (James McAvoy) joins secret assassins who take their orders from Fate itself.

programme.title: Terminator Salvation
programme.desc: As the machines prepare for a final attack, John Connor (Christian Bale) and a mysterious stranger (Sam Worthington) delve into the heart of Skynet and uncover a terrible secret involving the annihilation of mankind.

programme.title: Down Terrace
programme.desc: The body count rises as father-and-son crime kingpins (Robert Hill, Robin Hill) try to discover the identity of a traitor in their midst.

programme.title: Sinister
programme.desc: A true-crime novelist (Ethan Hawke) and his family become the targets of a supernatural entity when he uses found footage to unravel the murders of his home's previous occupants.

programme.title: Here Comes the Devil
programme.desc: A couple lose their children near some caves in Tijuana, Mexico. When finally they are found, it becomes clear that something terrifying has changed them.

programme.title: Black Swan
programme.desc: A ballerina (Natalie Portman) begins to lose her fragile grip on reality as a sultry newcomer (Mila Kunis) threatens to usurp her position as the lead dancer in "Swan Lake.".

programme.title: Black Swan
programme.desc: A ballerina (Natalie Portman) begins to lose her fragile grip on reality as a sultry newcomer (Mila Kunis) threatens to usurp her position as the lead dancer in "Swan Lake.".

programme.title: Breathe
programme.desc: After contracting polio at the age of 28, Robin Cavendish is confined to a bed and given only months to live. With help from his family and inventor Teddy Hall, Cavendish devotes the rest of his life to helping fellow patients and the disabled.

programme.title: Everest
programme.desc: Climbers (Jason Clarke, Josh Brolin, John Hawkes) from two expeditions fight for survival during a fierce blizzard on Mount Everest.

programme.title: Gangs of New York
programme.desc: During the era of Tammany Hall's sway, a young man (Leonardo DiCaprio) vows vengeance on the vicious gangster (Daniel Day-Lewis) who killed his father.

programme.title: The Family
programme.desc: After snitching on the mob, a Mafia boss (Robert De Niro) and his family enter the Witness Protection Program and relocate to a sleepy town in France, but their insistence on resorting to their old habits places them in danger from vengeful cronies.

programme.title: The Knick
programme.desc: Dr. Edwards lobbies to be appointed chief of surgery; Dr. Gallinger refuses to return as Edwards' subordinate; Lucy's attempts to make amends with Bertie are rebuffed; Cleary schemes to make extra money.

programme.title: The Knick
programme.desc: Dr. Thackery sets his sights on a return to the Knick; Cornelia enlists Cleary to do a dirty job; Bertie makes a change; Robertson pushes a new subway initiative; Barrow drives up construction costs; an unexpected visitor surprises Lucy.

programme.title: The Knick
programme.sub-title: The Best With the Best to Get the Best
programme.desc: Thackery enlists Edwards to help him test a new hypothesis; Lucy learns that confession is not always good for the soul; a young journalist works on a story about one of Thackery's rivals; Barrow faces a new adversary at Tammany Hall.

programme.title: The Knick
programme.desc: Abby's worsening condition persuades Thackery to test out his novel syphilis treatment; Edwards comes clean to Opal but is surprised at her response; Cornelia probes a suspicious death.

programme.title: The Knick
programme.desc: The Knick faces an influx of patients following a subway explosion; Lucy takes advice from one of Ping Wu's girls; Thackery tests out his latest theory on addiction; Genevieve charms the Chickerings.

programme.title: Crank: High Voltage
programme.desc: Powered by an artificial heart, Chev Chelios (Jason Statham) embarks on a frantic chase through Los Angeles to find the thief who stole his own, nearly indestructible, one.

programme.title: Demolition
programme.desc: A sympathetic woman (Naomi Watts) and her young son (Judah Lewis) form a strong bond with an investment banker (Jake Gyllenhaal) whose life begins to unravel following the death of his wife (Heather Lind).

programme.title: Cut Bank
programme.desc: Things go from bad to worse when a murder witness (Liam Hemsworth) in small-town Montana tries to leverage the crime into a get-rich-quick scheme.

programme.title: Good Neighbours
programme.desc: Victor is new to Montreal and attempts to make friends with the wheelchair-bound Spencer and the cat-loving Louise, but everybody is on edge with a serial killer terrorizing the neighborhood.

programme.title: Don Jon
programme.desc: A New Jersey bartender (Joseph Gordon-Levitt) embarks on his first genuine relationship with a woman (Scarlett Johansson), but his constant craving for Internet porn threatens to bring things crashing down.

programme.title: Shakespeare in Love
programme.desc: Young William Shakespeare (Joseph Fiennes) falls for Viola (Gwyneth Paltrow), reawakening his creativity, but she is betrothed to Wessex.

programme.desc: Young William Shakespeare (Joseph Fiennes) falls for Viola (Gwyneth Paltrow), reawakening his creativity, but she is betrothed to Wessex.

programme.title: Snowden

programme.title: Mona Lisa Smile
programme.desc: In 1953 a professor (Julia Roberts) of art history challenges her female students (Kirsten Dunst, Julia Stiles) to re-examine the traditional roles of women.

programme.title: My Sister's Keeper
programme.desc: A girl (Abigail Breslin) who was conceived as a marrow donor for her gravely ill sister goes to court to seek emancipation and prevent further harvesting of her body tissue.

programme.title: The Devil Wears Prada
programme.desc: A recent college graduate (Anne Hathaway) lands a job working for a famous and diabolical editor (Meryl Streep) of a New York fashion magazine.

programme.title: Joy
programme.desc: A working-class single mother (Jennifer Lawrence) builds a business dynasty while dealing with her dysfunctional parents and ex-husband (Edgar Ramírez).

programme.title: I, Tonya
programme.desc: In 1991, talented figure skater Tonya Harding becomes the first American woman to complete a triple axel during a competition. In 1994, her world comes crashing down when her ex-husband conspires to injure fellow Olympic hopeful Nancy Kerrigan.

programme.title: White Bird in a Blizzard
programme.desc: A teenager (Shailene Woodley) relishes her newfound freedom after her disturbed mother (Eva Green) vanishes, but the strange facts of the disappearance soon begin to haunt her.

programme.title: The Lovers
programme.desc: A man and his wife, each embroiled in an extramarital affair, are sent reeling when they suddenly fall for the least likely person imaginable -- each other.

programme.title: The Souvenir
programme.desc: A shy but ambitious film student falls into an intense, emotionally fraught relationship with a charismatic but untrustworthy older man.

programme.title: Unsung Hero
programme.desc: David Smallbone moves his family to the United States to search for a brighter future. Struggling to make ends meet, he soon realizes the talents of his children, who go on to become two of the most successful acts in contemporary Christian music.

programme.title: All Is Bright
programme.desc: Two shady French-Canadians hatch a get-rich-quick scheme, by selling Christmas trees in New York City.

programme.title: Midas

programme.title: The Bone Collector
programme.desc: A quadriplegic detective (Denzel Washington) and a patrol cop (Angelina Jolie) try to catch a killer re-creating grisly crimes.

programme.title: Knock at the Cabin

programme.title: BMF
programme.desc: Meech and Terry return to Detroit from Atlanta with a product and a new technique to flood the streets with BMF product; Meech links up with Sterling and the PA Boys to continue his quest to kill Lamar.

programme.title: BMF
programme.desc: In a risky move that could cost them their lives, Meech and Terry travel to St. Martin to steal K-9's Colombian connect.

programme.title: BMF
programme.desc: The Flenory brothers buy a car wash to pack cars after being flushed with product from a new plug; Meech turns dealers into kingmakers, and Terry hires new drivers.

programme.title: BMF
programme.desc: The Flenory brothers travel to Atlanta during "Freaknik" to set up a new distribution hub for BMF and reconnect with their business associates Ty Washington and Goldie; not everyone survives the road trip.

programme.title: BMF
programme.desc: Meech and Terry finally handle Detective Bryant, Lamar and B-Mickie before charting the next big step for BMF's expansion, which will change the course of their relationship forever.

programme.desc: Elite spy Orson Fortune must track down and stop the sale of a deadly new weapons technology wielded by a billionaire arms broker. Fortune and his crew recruit Hollywood's biggest star to help them on their globe-trotting mission to save the world.

programme.title: The Mean One
